name: Pork and Cabbage Stir Fry
instructions: Marinate pork in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic
Heat wok or large skillet over high heat
Season with soy sauce and sesame oil
tips: Use a meat thermometer to ensure chicken reaches 165°F (74°C)
Let beef rest for 5 minutes after cooking for juicier results
Use room temperature eggs for better results
